page.title: 19Country Dancing.
page.content: My name is Emma. I like country dancing. I go to a children's class every Saturday in summer. My Mum and Dad go country dancing as well. They go to pubs and fetes around Eastbourne. We travel to lots of places to dance, places like Hastings, Polegate, Langney and Hampden Park. We also work with other people and their children. We do dances like "Shepherd's Hay", "I want to be near you", "Circassian Circle" and Snake. My Mum makes costumes and the patterns for the skirts and waistcoats for the men. There are lots of folk groups for children. Our group regularly gives displays in and around Eastbourne.
